hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #0# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Magic Beans# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #the Market#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #generic grotto#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Did you know that you can have complete control over the item placement, item pool, and more, using Plandomizer?

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Small Key#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Saria's Song#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find the #Lon Lon Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern GS Side Room Near Lower Lizalfos

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Saria's Song#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found at #Zora's River#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #the hero#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path of #time#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Ganon's trials# protect the way to #Volvagia#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of #time#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Near Boss

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room
